sentence.Network_en: Giving an arsonist a lighter is beyond a joke.
sentence.Network_cn: 把打火机交给纵火犯简直是不可理喻。

sentence.Network_en: You're pretty sure you can identify a single arsonist?
sentence.Network_cn: 你确信你能鉴别出一个特定的纵火者?

sentence.Network_en: Within two hours the arsonist was taken up by the police.
sentence.Network_cn: 纵火犯在两小时内就被警察抓住了.

list.abs: The shopkeeper was burned out by arsonists ., 店主被纵火犯逐出商店.
2013年9月2日 -  An arsonist 纵火者 、、 arson 纵火(罪) A rapist 强*犯 、、 rape 强*(罪) A mugger 自背后袭击的盗匪(one of robber) 、、 mugging.
Tibet arsonist gets suspended death sentence ., 西藏纵火犯被判死缓.
The arsonist may harbour a grudge against the company ., 纵火犯可能对公司怀恨在心.

entry.def: An arsonist is a person who deliberately sets fire to a building or vehicle.

means.word_mean: 1. a criminal who illegally sets fire to property

sentences.en: The factory was destroyed in a fire started by arsonists.
sentences.cn: 工厂在纵火犯引起的火灾中烧毀了。
